desc: Tilly's offers an exciting array of ethnic and regional dishes, including chowders, soups, rice dishes, pasta mixes, and spice blends. Ideal for busy families, professionals on the go, as well as yachting, sailing, camping or cottage getaways. Tilly’s products are shelf stable, hearty, flavourful, healthy.

layout.text: Non GMO, Non Dairy and Gluten Free
